text: Maga kaya asa manusya adhika cangala ahe, jyane apalya imaratica paya allahace bhaya rakhanyavara ani allahaci prasannata prapta karanyavara thevala asela kinva to manusya, jyane apalya gharaca paya ekhadya utara asalelya daricya (ghatacya) kinaryavara, ji kosalanyacya betata asavi, tyavara racala asela; maga to tyasaha jahannamacya agita ja'una padava ani sarvasrestha allaha asa atyacarinna marga dakhavita nahi
